The 'Royal Canadian Mounted Police' ('RCMP') ( (GRC), literally âRoyal
Gendarmerie of Canada'; colloquially known as 'The Mounties', and internally as
âThe Force') is both a federal and a national police force of Canada, and one of
the most recognized of its kind in the world. It is unique in the world as a
national, federal, provincial and municipal policing body. The RCMP provides
policing services to all of Canada at a federal level, and also on a contract
basis to the three territories, eight of Canada's provinces (the RCMP does not
provide provincial or municipal policing in either Ontario or Quebec), more than
190 municipalities, 184 aboriginal communities, and three international
airports.
categories: Organizations based in Canada with royal patronage
